8445.quoteText: Though you don’t have to, you can choose to provide your email to set up an account with us

8446.quoteText: We know how important your personal data is to you, so we will never sell it.
8446.title: This service does not sell your personal data

8447.quoteText: That means we will share your data if needed to complete your purchase, with businesses who help us operate Honey, or if we are legally required to do so.

11973.quoteText:
We don’t knowingly collect or solicit personal information from children.
If you are a child under 18, please do not attempt to register for Honey’s products or send any personal information to us.
11973.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

11974.quoteText: When you are on a pre-approved retail site, to help you save money, Honey will collect information about that site that lets us know which coupons and promos to find for you.
11974.title: This service tracks you on other websites

tosdr.case: This service tracks you on other websites

11975.quoteText: Honey uses cookies, pixel tags, web beacons, and other markers (we’ll just call them “cookies”) to collect some of the data discussed in this Privacy Policy.
11975.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

11976.quoteText:
P.S.
If you have any questions or comments, just email us at privacy@joinhoney.com.
